00057 class Parser
00058 {
00059         public:
00060                 struct Comparator : public std::binary_function<const class Object*, const class Object*, bool>
00061                 {
00062                         virtual bool operator()(const class Object *thisObject, const class Object *otherObject) const;
00063                 };
00064         
00065                 enum List
00066                 {
00067                         Comments,
00068                         Keywords,
00069                         TextMacros,
00070                         TextMacroInstances,
00071                         Types,
00072                         Globals,
00073                         Members,
00074                         FunctionInterfaces,
00075                         Functions,
00076                         Methods,
00077                         Interfaces,
00078                         Structs,
00079                         Scopes,
00080                         Libraries,
00081                         SourceFiles,
00082                         DocComments,
00083                         MaxLists
00084                 };
00085                 
00086                 enum SearchMode
00087                 {
00088                         Unspecified = 0, 
00089                         CheckContainer = 0x02, 
00090                         CheckScope = 0x04,
00091                         CheckLibrary = 0x06
00092                 };
